description: Percentage ice-cloud cover as seen by the MODIS instrument simulator. Dimensions of cloud IWP (cloud ice water path) and r_eff (effective droplet size). The effective radius bin edges are defined in the COSP simulator (see lines 134-152 of cosp_config.F90: <https://github.com/CFMIP/COSPv2.0/blob/master/src/cosp_config.F90>)
ui-label: MODIS Ice Topped Cloud Area Fraction
